Label.name: money_score
Label.helptext: Player's current treasury + income expected in near future

Label.name: land_score
Label.helptext: Value of usable land i.e Amount of Land that can be used to create buildings

Label.name: resource_score
Label.helptext: Value of resources generated from all the possible sources in the player's settlement(s)

Label.name: building_score
Label.helptext: Value of all the buildings in the player's settlement(s)

Label.name: settler_score
Label.helptext: Value denoting the progress of the settlement(s) in terms of inhabitants, buildings and overall happiness

Label.name: unit_score
Label.helptext: Value of all the units owned by the player

Label.name: total_score
Label.helptext: The total value from all individual entities or in short : Total Player Score
